attributes.action: make sure equal rights are carried out at Langford before 8.30 am.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is all about being equal, some people get treated nicer and have more rights than us.  This is terrible and it has to STOP.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
